doc.after: The two Maxwell equations, Faraday's Law and the AmpÃ¨re-Maxwell Law, illustrate a very practical feature of the electromagnetic field. Faraday's Law may be stated roughly as 'a changing magnetic field creates an electric field'. This is the principle behind the electric generator.
